table.name: civicrm_hrleaveandabsences_contact_work_pattern
table.comment: Represents the work patterns linked to an employee

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: FK to the Contact representing the employee

field.name: pattern_id
field.comment: FK to the Work Pattern linked to an employee

field.name: effective_date
field.comment: The date this work pattern will start to be considered active

field.name: effective_end_date
field.comment: The date this work pattern will stop being considered active

field.name: change_reason
field.label: Change Reason
field.comment: One of the values of the Job Contract Revision Change Reason option group

index.name: unique_pattern_per_effective_date
index.comment: An employee cannot have more than one work pattern
